name: GuavaBox
tag_list: marketing, web-design, hosting, social-media-marketing, smm, seo, inbound-marketing, content-marketing, consulting, small-business
overview:
GuavaBox works with small businesses and non-profits to help them optimize their online presence and engage their target markets.

GuavaBox provides web design, web hosting, social media marketing, search engine optimization, video production, and strategic content marketing services.

GuavaBox is a team of young, motivated entrepreneurs, sharing a passion for simplifying and improving the lives of small businesses and non-profit organizations. They bring creativity, collaborative talents, and shared experience to create new ways for organizations to connect with new and existing customers.
